(Not) Your Average Twitter User

Discovering groups of similar Twitter users based on their profiles.

About
Intro
Analysis
Visualizations

This data story was created by Marie Biolková, Michael Chan and Polina Poskura as part of the Applied Data Analysis course at EPFL (2020). It is an extension to a replication study of Liang & Fu’s Testing Propositions Derived from Twitter Studies.

Contact

{marie.biolkova, chunheimichael.chan, polina.proskura}@epfl.ch

Data

We used the EgoAlterProfiles and EgoTimelines datasets from the study. It can be downloaded here.
